It’s all about the mindset you choose - Stratford District mayor Neil Volzke https://www.nzherald.co.nz/stratford-press/news/its-all-about-the-mindset-you-choose-stratford-district-mayor-neil-volzke/XLWJXWFZQ5FAVCLTE2FGIOHRB4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/stratford-press/news/its-all-about-the-mindset-you-choose-stratford-district-mayor-neil-volzke/XLWJXWFZQ5FAVCLTE2FGIOHRB4/ Neil Volzke, Stratford District Council mayorOPINION: Plenty to be postitive about in Stratford. Soldier pleads guilty to groping two bartenders at Linton Military Camp https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/soldier-pleads-guilty-to-groping-two-bartenders-at-linton-military-camp/MYXQCH57DRBJDJQWFG74O7JL7U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/soldier-pleads-guilty-to-groping-two-bartenders-at-linton-military-camp/MYXQCH57DRBJDJQWFG74O7JL7U/ Jeremy Wilkinson'I could visibly see that she was uncomfortable' bar staffer said about woman he touched. Photo / Jeremy Wilkinson
Wairoa flooding: Taskforce Kiwi volunteers on the ground for disaster response https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/wairoa-flooding-taskforce-kiwi-volunteers-on-the-ground-for-disaster-response/XX3EAIRKAVHQRFKWC652K3NHRQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/wairoa-flooding-taskforce-kiwi-volunteers-on-the-ground-for-disaster-response/XX3EAIRKAVHQRFKWC652K3NHRQ/ Eva KershawDefence Force and emergency services veterans volunteering their services in Wairoa. Mon, 01 Jul 2024 04:17:11 +0000 The nationwide, veteran-led disaster relief charity Taskforce Kiwi is bridging the gaps in the disaster response in Wairoa.
Woman dies from liver cancer after regular scans were stopped due to Health NZ system failure https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-dies-from-liver-cancer-after-regular-scans-were-stopped-due-to-health-nz-system-failure/4HQAKJN6VBFUVC5GO2DGJAWSOM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-dies-from-liver-cancer-after-regular-scans-were-stopped-due-to-health-nz-system-failure/4HQAKJN6VBFUVC5GO2DGJAWSOM/ Hannah BartlettPatient had regular scans until 2019 when the surveillance ended.Mon, 01 Jul 2024 04:05:01 +0000 A woman at high risk of liver cancer was supposed to be given appointments for surveillance ultrasounds, but a systems change meant her scans were missed. By the time cancer was detected, it was already advanced and she later died.
Lochearnhead Shears: Wairarapa’s David Buick wins open final in Scotland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/lochearnhead-shears-wairarapas-david-buick-wins-open-final-in-scotland/NAFKHLVY6ZDLPKGPDDLLX5Z7TA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/lochearnhead-shears-wairarapas-david-buick-wins-open-final-in-scotland/NAFKHLVY6ZDLPKGPDDLLX5Z7TA/ Doug LaingBuick wins the open final but Scotland takes the Joe Te Kapa Memorial Trophy. Mon, 01 Jul 2024 04:00:00 +0000 The line-up after Scotland won the latest Joe Te Kapa Memorial Trophy shearing test match at the Lochearnhead Shears in Scotland at the weekend. The New Zealand team of shearers Jack Fagan (left), David Buick, and manager Mark Barrowcliffe, Te Kapa's daughter, Emily Te Kapa, and the Scotland team of Calum Shaw and Hamish Mitchell.
